job.title: NOPCommerce certified developer - C#, ASP.NET
job.description: If you are a NOPCommerce certified developer with experience please read on We are currently seeking a NOPCommerce certified developer to help expand our ecommerce platform options As on of the most prestigious schools in our field in the West Coast we would prefer a local candidate to the Southern California Area but are remote flexible This role is a full time direct position on our growing teambrbrSalary 80000  120000 per yearbrbrWhat You Need for this Positionbrulli NOPCommerce certifiedbrliul Experience with Microsoft Stack C ASPNET MVCbrbr eCommerce experiencebrbrNice to havebrbr NET Corebrbr Agile experiencebrbrWhats In It for Youbrbr Competitive Base Salarybrbr Excellent Benefits Packagebrbr Flexible Work Schedulebrbr Accelerated Career GrowthbrbrSo if you are a NOPCommerce certified developer with experience please apply todaybrbrstronguEmail Your Resume In Word TobrbrustrongLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you Clicking apply is the best way to apply but you may alsobrbrStephenMarodaCyberCoderscombrulliPlease do NOT change the email subject line in any way You must keep the JobID linkedin  SM11640085  in the email subject line for your application to be consideredbrliulStephen Maroda  Lead Recruiter  CyberCodersbrbrApplicants must be authorized to work in the USbrbrstrongCyberCoders Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity EmployerbrbrstrongAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex national origin disability protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by lawbrbrstrongYour Right to Workstrong  In compliance with federal law all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire
